short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of Google search ads? This extension hides sponsored content for a cleaner experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ad-Free and Scam-Free Search Experience
Tired of sponsored content and ads on Google Search? Worried about the dangers of scam ads? Then this extension is for you!

Features:

Hides sponsored content and ads: Only see organic results in Google Search.
Blocks scam ads: Protects you from phishing and other online scams.
Enables faster and more efficient searching: Find the information you need faster by eliminating distractions.
Provides a cleaner and more minimalist search experience: Simplifies the interface for easy use.
Why Use This Extension?

To search more safely: Scam ads can be used to steal your personal information or infect your device with viruses. Our extension blocks these ads and protects you from online threats.
To research more efficiently: Sponsored content and ads can make it difficult to find the information you need. Our extension hides this content to help you find what you're looking for faster.
To have a more enjoyable search experience: Ads and sponsored content can clutter your search experience. Our extension cleans up the search page for a more enjoyable experience.
Install now and enjoy ad-free and scam-free searching!

Note: Our extension is free and easy to use. It takes just a few minutes to install.
